title: Update Subscription Frequency
description: A customer wants to change their subscription from being delivered every month to every two months.

tasks.description: Log into their account and navigate to the 'Manage Subscription' page.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer accesses their subscription details.

tasks.description: Select the option to change the delivery frequency.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer accesses the frequency setting.

tasks.description: Change the frequency from 'Every 1 Month' to 'Every 2 Months' and save.
tasks.expected_outcome: The subscription schedule is successfully updated to the new frequency.
